data.oai_dc:dc: Genepop formatted file containing genotypes from the 6,254 filtered SNPs and 286 individuals with >80% genotyping rate used in this study. SNP names are radtag_snp position i.e. a SNP named 12_46 would be on radtag number 12 and the SNP would be at position 46 in the tag. Population abbreviations are identical to those in Table S1 of the publication.
genomic islands of divergence|ecotype|local adaptation|genotyping by sequencing|sockeye salmon|divergence hitchhiking
